## Data Visualization Excercise

```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
starwars
```

## Mass Vs Weight

We will study the Mass vs Weight relationship through scatterplot


```{r warning= FALSE}
library(ggplot2) 
ggplot(starwars, aes(x= height, y = mass)) + geom_point() +
  
  labs(title = "Mass vs Weight of Strwars Characters", x = "Heights (cm)", y = "Weight (kg)" )

```
